channel.title: Rfc9420 on OpenMLS
channel.description: Recent content in Rfc9420 on OpenMLS

item.title: OpenMLS 0.5 released
item.description: Today, we are releasing OpenMLS v0.5. This release has been a while in the making and covers substantial changes since the last release. We are grateful for the support of the Sovereign Tech Fund towards this goal. These are some of the changes: The implementation caught up with the latest changes in the protocol specification. The last version was roughly based on draft 12. Since then, the protocol has iteratively evolved all the way through draft 20.
